columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name identifying the user.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: The stable and unique string identifying the user.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the user.

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time, when the user was created.

columns.name: password_last_used
columns.description: The date and time, when the user's password was last used to sign in to an AWS website.

columns.name: permissions_boundary_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the policy used to set the permissions boundary for the user.

columns.name: mfa_enabled
columns.description: The MFA status of the user.

columns.name: login_profile
columns.description: Contains the user name and password create date for a user.

columns.name: mfa_devices
columns.description: A list of MFA devices attached to the user.

columns.name: groups
columns.description: A list of groups attached to the user.

columns.name: inline_policies
columns.description: A list of policy documents that are embedded as inline policies for the user.

columns.name: inline_policies_std
columns.description: Inline policies in canonical form for the user.

columns.name: attached_policy_arns
columns.description: A list of managed policies attached to the user.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to the user.
